phrs.translation: 真核生物, 真核细胞, 真核生物域
已发现的真核起始因子, 起始因子

sentences.sentence: So mouse ERA protein may play important role in eukaryote cell cycle.
sentences.translation: 所以，鼠era蛋白在细胞周期中发挥重要作用。

sentences.sentence: It is this nucleus that gives the eukaryote-literally, true nucleus-its name.
sentences.translation: 正是这些细胞核给了真核细胞-照字面意思，真的细胞核-的名字。

sentences.sentence: Many research teams have been striving to determine the structure of a eukaryote ribosome (see 'Structures of desire').
sentences.translation: 许多研究小组力求确定一个真核核糖的结构（看到向往的结构）。
